section.title: Capture file format not understood
section.para:
If Ethereal cannot decode the capture file format of the file you have asked it to load, you will receive a warning box similar to that shown in .
Read File Format warning

section.title: Save file error
section.para: If Ethereal cannot open the file you requested it to save captured packets in, you will receive a warning box similar to that shown in . Save Error warning
